responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "AC6EF916491D4BEA90A8789ACE1BC9C7", "The coffin is lined with runes and sealed by a powerful ward. There is a cantrip with the Knock of Fynnaegal. It has the power to remove the ward and allow the stony vault to release its treasures. I\'ve sent my finest stalker to retrieve it. No doubt, Splint won\'t let us down. Now begone, before I alert my bandits to your presence. ")
name: MADD_0005B_HOD_TheHighwayman_9
